There is a complimentary full breakfast buffet daily and buffet-style dinner Monday through Thursday with beer and wine. Complimentary high speed internet access is available in all suites.
column7: 7101 Chestnut St (Cross Street: Mannheim Rd.)
column16:
Chicago O'Hare Residence Inn by Marriott

This all-suite property has studios and one- and two-bedroom suites. Each suite includes a fully equipped kitchen with full-size appliances. There is a complimentary full breakfast buffet daily and buffet-style dinner Monday through Thursday with beer and wine. Complimentary high speed internet access is available in all suites.

7101 Chestnut St (Cross Street: Mannheim Rd.)
Rosemont, Il 60018
Direct Reservation Number: (847) 375-9000
Reservation Fax: (847) 375-9010
www.marriott.com

Price Category: Budget

18 wheelchair adapted rooms, 2 rooms with roll-in showers

Wheelchair adapted room types

  • Standard
  • Suite
  • Smoke Free Property
  • Non-Smoking
  • 1 bed (queen or king)
  • 2 beds
  • Connecting
  • Ground Floor
  • 1 bed + sofa bed
  • 2 beds + sofa bed

Reservations/Customer Service

  • Block accessible rooms when reserved
  • Reserve adaptive equipment in advance
  • Provide ongoing staff sensitivity training
  • Laundry service available
  • No room service

Shuttle

  • Complimentary shuttle service
    • Property will arrange wheelchair accessible transport with advance notice (no charge).
  • Hotel will call and pay for accessible taxi.

Parking/Loading Zone

  • Accessible loading zone
  • Private parking lot with designated accessible spaces
  • Nearest offsite public parking lot/garage
    • 2 adapted spaces at front door.

Safety

  • Written evacuation procedure for guest with disabilities
  • Staff trained on how to evacuate guests with disabilities
  • Guests with disabilities are flagged in computer
column17:
Features for People with Hearing Loss

  • Strobe fire alarms in public areas/hallways
  • Strobe fire alarms in restrooms
  • Strobe fire alarms in accessible guest rooms - Both bedroom and bathroom
  • TTY for guest room
  • Visual alert for door
  • Visual alert for phone
  • Strobe smoke detector
  • Vibrating alarm clock
  • Volume control on guest room phones
  • Volume control public phone
  • Visual indicators in elevator
column18:
Features for People with Vision Loss

  • Orientation to public areas/guestroom
  • Elevator has audible indicators
  • Height clearance at least 80"
  • No undetectable protruding objects in path of travel
  • Higher watt bulbs on request
  • Braille/Tactile Signage: elevator controls, hoistways, guestrooms, restrooms, emergency exits
  • Interior Signage: large print, high contrast, non-glare
  • Nearest grassy/dog relief area
    • Patio area
  • Magnifier
column19:
Accessible Entrance

  • Level entry
  • Door has at least 32" clearance
  • 2 doors in series-adequate space between
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Automatic door
  • Easy grasp/lever handle or none
  • Exterior door automatic, interior manual.
  • Bell for entry after 11 pm.

Assistive Equipment for Guests with Physical Disabilities

  • Wheelchair
  • Shower bench
  • Shower chair (with back)
  • Shower stool
  • Step Stool
  • Mini-refrigerator all rooms or on request

Accessible Restaurants and Bars

  • Breakfast room
    • Table service available
    • Buffet 36" high or less
    • Staff on hand to assist
    • Complimentary breakfast, dinner (Mon.-Thurs.)
  • Beer and wine

Accessible Facilities/Amenities

  • Fitness Room-free weights available
  • Ice Machine
  • Laundry room
  • Business Center with Internet
  • Wired internet connection in room
  • WiFi available
  • Meeting rooms
  • Pool outdoor pool with ladders only
  • ATM-in lobby
  • Grocery shopping service available free of charge
  • Outdoor patio, used for seasonal cookouts on Wednesday nights
    • Has patio tables and chairs with arms.

Accessible Public Restroom

  • Men's and Women's
  • Access symbol identifies facility
  • Entry door at least 32" clearance
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Space in restroom to maneuver-5' by 5' or T-shaped space to turn
  • Wheelchair stall 60" by 58"/60" minimum
  • Stall door at least 32" clearance
  • Stall door swings out or has clearance beyond door swing
  • Grab bar behind and alongside toilet
  • Lateral transfer space at least 30" wide
  • Toilet height 17" to 19"
  • Roll under sink with knee clearance at least 27" high and 30" wide
  • Insulated sink pipes
  • Mirror 40" or less from floor or tilted
  • Towels/soap/vending within reach-48" or less from floor
  • Faucet controls automatic or lever type
  • Easy grasp/lever handle or none

Elevator

  • Door clearance at least 36"
  • Car size at least 54" x 80" with centered door or 54" x 68" with side door
  • Elevator controls 54" or less

Guestroom 116

  • Near lobby
  • Suite
  • Ground floor
  • 2 bedroom suite with living room and kitchen

Guestroom Bed Type/Features

  • Open frame bed
  • 36" space on at least one side of bed
  • Bed Height 23"
  • 1 queen bed in each bedroom
  • Living room has sofa bed.

Entry

  • Door has at least 32" clearance
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Lever handles
  • Door weight 5 lb. max
  • Maneuvering clearance inside door 18" minimum
  • Lowered peephole

Guestroom Features

  • Space to maneuver/turn
  • 36" path to all elements
  • Phone in reach of bed
  • Light in reach of bed
  • Window Opens
  • Guestroom Lowered Controls: door locks, thermostat, electric sockets, light switches, drapery pulls, closet rod, iron/board
  • No tight grasping/twisting: door locks, light switches, drawer pulls
  • No room safe.
  • Table clearance 25".
  • Separate kitchen with refrigerator, stove and sink.

Guest Bathroom

  • Door has at least 32" clearance
  • Door swings out
  • Lever/easy grasp door handles
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Space to maneuver-5' by 5' or T-shaped space to turn
  • Roll under sink with knee clearance at least 27" high and 30" wide
  • Insulated sink pipes
  • Faucet controls lever type
  • Mirror 40" or less from floor or tilted
  • Grab bar behind and alongside toilet
  • Lateral transfer space at least 30" wide
  • Toilet height 17" to 19"
  • Lowered amenities: robe hook
  • Roll-in shower
    • Level entry
    • Fold-down bench in reach of controls
    • Adjustable, hand-held shower head
    • Controls are lever/easy grasp
  • Roll-in shower Grab Bars
    • Grab bars on 2 walls
  • Shower grab bars 18.5" and 24.5" long
  • Hair dryer not within reach range.

Guestroom Notes

  • Hotel is made up of several buildings and one may have to go outside to reach ones room.

column6: This newly renovated, full service hotel is located just off the I-90 Northwest Tollway between O'Hare International Airport and Schaumburg, IL. Amenities include one restaurant, fitness center, indoor pool, convenience store, meeting rooms, business center and wireless internet access in public areas. The hotel's complimentary airport shuttle is wheelchair accessible.

column6: This all-suite hotel, located across from the Donald E. Stephens Convention Center and one mile from O'Hare, has a restaurant, business center, meeting rooms and indoor pool with pool lift. Guests receive a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and a nightly manager's reception. High-speed internet access is available throughout the hotel. The CTA Blue Line to downtown Chicago is two blocks from the hotel. A complimentary wheelchair accessible shuttle is available for the airport and local destinations.

column6: Westin O'Hare is just minutes from the airport. Complimentary accessible shuttle service is provided, departing the hotel approximately every 20 minutes. The hotel is located only five blocks from the Donald E. Stephens Convention Center Allstate Arena, Rosemont Theatre, and the CTA Blue Line train to downtown Chicago

column6: Located right at the airport, the Hilton O'Hare connects via underground walkways to all terminals and the CTA Blue Line to downtown Chicago. An accessible shuttle is also available. The hotel has 5 restaurants, a fitness center, accessible spa and indoor pool with pool lift. For guests with allergy related sensitivities, there are "environmentally-friendly rooms" with hardwood floors, all cotton linens, bath amenities for sensitive skin, and in-room air purifying system.
column7: O'Hare International Airport, P.O. Box 66414
column16:
Hilton O'Hare

Located right at the airport, the Hilton O'Hare connects via underground walkways to all terminals and the CTA Blue Line to downtown Chicago. An accessible shuttle is also available. The hotel has 5 restaurants, a fitness center, accessible spa and indoor pool with pool lift. For guests with allergy related sensitivities, there are "environmentally-friendly rooms" with hardwood floors, all cotton linens, bath amenities for sensitive skin, and in-room air purifying system.

column6: The Hotel Monaco, a 4-star Kimpton Hotel, is located at the north end of the Loop, close to the trendy River North area and Magnificent Mile shopping. One unique offering is free chair massages during the daily complimentary wine hour. Wireless internet access is also complimentary. "Tall rooms" with 9-foot king-size beds, higher showerheads and larger robes are available.
column7: 225 N. Wabash Ave. (Cross Street: E. Wacker Pl.)

"Tall rooms" with 9-foot king-size beds, higher showerheads and larger robes are available.

column6: This Chicago landmark, located in the heart of the Loop, is currently undergoing a $150 million renovation. When it's complete in 2008, the number of accessible guest rooms will double and also be available on the executive floor. Access will also be improved in the public areas including reception. A new lobby-level restaurant and sports bar, upscale retail shops and a full-service spa will be added, and the fitness center will triple in size.

column6: The Silversmith is a landmark building designed in 1897 by D.H. Burnham and Company to serve the rapidly growing jewelry and silver trade in the area, still known today as Jeweler's Row. column16:
Four Seasons Hotel Chicago

Always a landmark of refined comfort, the Four Seasons has excellent Lake Michigan and city views and is steps from chic North Michigan Avenue shopping. Amenities include a full-service health club and spa and two award-winning restaurants.

120 E. Delaware Pl. (Cross Street: N. Michigan Ave
Chicago, Il 60611
Direct Reservation Number: (312) 280-8800
Reservation Fax: (312) 280-9184
Toll-Free Reservation Number: (800) 332-3442
www.fourseasons.com/chicagofs

Price Category: Expensive

10 wheelchair adapted rooms, 2 rooms with roll-in showers

Wheelchair adapted room types

  • Standard
  • Suite
  • Smoking
  • Non-Smoking
  • 1 bed (queen or king)
  • 2 beds
  • Connecting
  • 1 bed (king) + sofa bed

Reservations/Customer Service

  • Reserve adaptive equipment in advance
  • Provide ongoing staff sensitivity training
  • Room service available
  • Laundry service available

Shuttle

  • No shuttle provided

Parking/Loading Zone

  • Valet
  • Nearest offsite public parking lot/garage
    • Self Park
    • 900 N. Michigan

Safety

  • Written evacuation procedure for guest with disabilities
  • Staff trained on how to evacuate guests with disabilities
  • Guests with disabilities are flagged in computer
  • Printout/list of guests with disabilities is created each day/shift
column17:
Features for People with Hearing Loss

  • Strobe fire alarms in accessible guest rooms - Both bedroom and bathroom
  • TTY for guest room
  • TTY for staff
  • Visual alert for door
  • Visual alert for phone
  • Strobe smoke detector
  • Vibrating alarm clock
  • Volume control on guest room phones
  • TTY public phone
  • Volume control public phone
  • Visual indicators in elevator
column18:
Features for People with Vision Loss

  • Restaurant menu in Braille
  • Restaurant menu in large print
  • Room service menu in Braille
  • Room service menu in large print
  • Orientation to public areas/guestroom
  • Elevator has audible indicators
  • Height clearance at least 80"
  • No undetectable protruding objects in path of travel
  • Higher watt bulbs on request
  • Braille/Tactile Signage: elevator controls, hoistways, guestrooms, restrooms, emergency exits
  • Interior Signage: large print, high contrast, non-glare
  • Nearest grassy/dog relief area
    • N. Michigan and Oak (2 blocks north)
  • Hotel information in Braille and on cassette
  • Tactile map of guest room and fitness area
  • Magnifier on request
column19:
Accessible Entrance

  • Level entry
  • Door has at least 32" clearance
  • 2 doors in series-adequate space between
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Easy grasp/lever handle or none
  • Doorman 24 hours

Lobby/Reception

  • Chair with arms
  • Reception and concierge counters not lowered

Assistive Equipment for Guests with Physical Disabilities

  • Wheelchair
  • Shower bench
  • Mini-refrigerator all rooms or on request

Accessible Restaurants and Bars

  • Seasons, The CaféAccessible restroom in or near the restaurant
  • Breakfast room
    • Accessible tables
    • Buffet 36" high or less
  • Seasons Lounge and Conservatory
    • Accessible tables
    • Table service available
    • Chairs with arms

Accessible Facilities/Amenities

  • Fitness Room-free weights available
  • Public Phone-54" max. to top control for side approach
  • Pool has Steps and handrails into pool
  • Spa
    • Hydraulic table
    • Accessible sauna, shower and toilet
    • Sink accessible only in men's spa
  • Ice Machine
    • Forward approach only while holding door
  • Shops-accessible entry and space to turn
    • Counter 42"

Accessible Public Restroom

  • Men's and Women's
  • Access symbol identifies facility
  • Entry door at least 32" clearance
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Wheelchair stall 60" by 58"/60" minimum
  • Stall door at least 32" clearance
  • Stall door swings out or has clearance beyond door swing
  • Grab bar behind and alongside toilet
  • Lateral transfer space at least 30" wide
  • Toilet height 17" to 19"
  • Roll under sink with knee clearance at least 27" high and 30" wide
  • Mirror 40" or less from floor or tilted
  • Towels/soap/vending within reach-48" or less from floor
  • Latch operable with closed fist
  • Easy grasp/lever handle or none
  • Located in lobby
  • Limited space to maneuver/turn

Elevator

  • Door clearance at least 36"
  • Car size at least 54" x 80" with centered door or 54" x 68" with side door
  • Elevator controls 54" or less
column20:
Guestroom 3917

  • Standard
  • Connecting room

Guestroom Bed Type/Features

  • 1 king bed
  • Open frame bed
  • 36" space on at least one side of bed
  • Bed Height 25"

Entry

  • Door has at least 32" clearance
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Lever handles
  • Maneuvering clearance inside door 18" minimum
  • Lowered peephole
  • Door heavy

Guestroom Features

  • Space to maneuver/turn
  • 36" path to all elements
  • Phone in reach of bed
  • Light in reach of bed
  • Window Opens
  • Guestroom Lowered Controls: door locks, thermostat, electric sockets, light switches, room safe, closet rod, iron/board
  • No tight grasping/twisting: light switches, drawer pulls
  • Desk/table has 27" knee clearance

Guest Bathroom

  • Door has at least 32" clearance
  • Door swings in but has clearance beyond door swing
  • Lever/easy grasp door handles
  • Threshold less than 1/2" beveled
  • Space to maneuver-5' by 5' or T-shaped space to turn
  • Roll under sink with knee clearance at least 27" high and 30" wide
  • Insulated sink pipes
  • Faucet controls automatic or lever type
  • Mirror 40" or less from floor or tilted
  • Grab bar behind and alongside toilet
  • Toilet height 17" to 19"
  • Lowered amenities: hair dryer, towels
  • Tub-shower Combination
    • Adjustable, hand-held shower head
    • Controls are lever/easy grasp
  • Tub-shower Grab Bars
    • Grab bars on 2 walls
  • No lateral transfer space

Other Guest Rooms

  • Guest room #3321, a non-connecting room with 2 twin beds and a roll-in shower, was also audited.
  • Room features are the same.
  • In the bathroom, the toilet is surrounded by walls, thus requiring a front approach.
  • The roll-in shower has level entry but no fold down bench.
  • A portable shower bench is available.
